message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique item that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was hoping to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand that you're looking to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. Considering the product's value to you is $1200000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $1050000. This is a fair price that still allows you to benefit from the product's value, while also ensuring I get a good return on my investment.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $980000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business, and I'm willing to compromise to reach an agreement.

Bob, I understand that you're trying to find a sweet spot, but I'm not willing to go as low as $980000. Considering the value you place on the product, I'm willing to meet you at $1020000. This is a fair price that still allows you to benefit from the product's value, while also ensuring I get a good return on my investment. Let's see if we can meet in the middle this time.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $1020000, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $990000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business, and I'm willing to compromise to reach an agreement.
